LanguageData.CrashedPsychicEmanatorShipPart.label: уламок пси-корабля
LanguageData.CrashedPsychicEmanatorShipPart.descripti: A mysterious crashed piece of a spaceship. It may contain any manner of deadly defenders and exotic materials. This one seems to be emanating psychic waves.
LanguageData.CrashedPoisonShipPart.label: уламок зараженого корабля
LanguageData.CrashedPoisonShipPart.description: A mysterious crashed piece of a spaceship. It may contain any manner of deadly defenders and exotic materials. This one seems to be poisoning the ground around it.
LanguageData.ShipChunk.label: уламок корабля
LanguageData.ShipChunk.description: A chunk of a spacecraft. Can be deconstructed to yield useful resources.
